title: 03/25/2021 - HOUR 1 - Harden, Browns, Lakers
itunes:title: 03/25/2021 - HOUR 1 - Harden, Browns, Lakers
description:
James Harden's style of play doesn't work in the playoffs

The Browns have a chance to be one of the best teams in the league

The Lakers shouldn't go after Kyle Lowry


Guest: Chris Haynes

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
